19.code:
from module1 import ReadDeathlistData, ProcessData, CalculateWeeklyDeaths, GenerateHistogram, OutputHistogram
import pandas as pd, os
def main():
    df = ReadDeathlistData()
    df = ProcessData(df)
    df_weekly = CalculateWeeklyDeaths(df)
    GenerateHistogram(df_weekly)
    OutputHistogram(df_weekly)
if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
